title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.4 - Application to be accompanied by photograph and fingerprints
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.4 - Application to be accompanied by photograph and fingerprints

State Regulations

For the purpose of assisting the commission to ascertain the
character, integrity and identity of the prospective pier superintendent or
hiring agent, each application shall be accompanied by a photograph and the
authenticated fingerprints of the prospective licensee on an identification
record form furnished by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
